categories.heading: WULFCO ID IS RELEASED!
categories.description: Wulfco ID has finally been finished and is now in Beta! We are excited to see what you guys think of it. If you have any suggestions, please let us know in the Discord server.

categories.heading: NEW STUFF!
categories.description: This update includes a lot of new stuff, a new FAQ page, this dialog, the ability to add payment methods etc...

categories.heading: FOR THE FUTURE
categories.description: Now that Wulfco ID is out of the way, we can start working on other projects (like Wulfco Authenticator) and start working on Wulfco Developers, Wulfco ID will still be maintained and updated, but not as much as it was before.
